These are the properties that an ABPerson record contains by default. ABRecord describes additional properties that all records contain, in �Constants�. Used in conjunction with , , and to determine name ordering.

member.name: T:Monobjc.AddressBook.ABSearchComparison
member.summary: These constants are of the type and are used by the method and the method .

member.name: F:Monobjc.AddressBook.ABSearchComparison.kABEqual
member.summary: Search for elements that are equal to the value.

member.name: F:Monobjc.AddressBook.ABSearchComparison.kABNotEqual
member.summary: Search for elements that are not equal to the value.

member.name: F:Monobjc.AddressBook.ABSearchComparison.kABLessThan
member.summary: Search for elements that are less than the value.

member.name: F:Monobjc.AddressBook.ABSearchComparison.kABLessThanOrEqual
member.summary: Search for elements that are less than or equal to the value.

member.name: F:Monobjc.AddressBook.ABSearchComparison.kABGreaterThan
member.summary: Search for elements that are greater than the value.

member.name: F:Monobjc.AddressBook.ABSearchComparison.kABGreaterThanOrEqual
member.summary: Search for elements that are greater than or equal to the value.

member.name: F:Monobjc.AddressBook.ABSearchComparison.kABEqualCaseInsensitive
member.summary: Search for elements that are greater than or equal to the value.

member.name: F:Monobjc.AddressBook.ABSearchComparison.kABContainsSubString
member.summary: Search for elements that contain the value.

member.name: F:Monobjc.AddressBook.ABSearchComparison.kABContainsSubStringCaseInsensitive
member.summary: Search for elements that contain the value, ignoring case.

member.name: F:Monobjc.AddressBook.ABSearchComparison.kABPrefixMatch
member.summary: Search for elements that begin with the value.

member.name: F:Monobjc.AddressBook.ABSearchComparison.kABPrefixMatchCaseInsensitive
member.summary: Search for elements that begin with the value, ignoring case.

member.name: F:Monobjc.AddressBook.ABSearchComparison.kABBitsInBitFieldMatch
member.summary: Search for elements that match the bits in ABPersonFlags. (Available in Mac OS X v10.3 and later.)

member.name: F:Monobjc.AddressBook.ABSearchComparison.kABDoesNotContainSubString
member.summary: Search for elements that do not contain the value. (Available in Mac OS X v10.4 and later.)

member.name: F:Monobjc.AddressBook.ABSearchComparison.kABDoesNotContainSubStringCaseInsensitive
member.summary: Search for elements that do not contain the value, ignoring case. (Available in Mac OS X v10.4 and later.)

member.name: F:Monobjc.AddressBook.ABSearchComparison.kABNotEqualCaseInsensitive
member.summary: Search for elements that are not equal to the value, ignoring case. (Available in Mac OS X v10.4 and later.)

member.name: F:Monobjc.AddressBook.ABSearchComparison.kABSuffixMatch
member.summary: Search for elements that end with the value. (Available in Mac OS X v10.4 and later.)

member.name: F:Monobjc.AddressBook.ABSearchComparison.kABSuffixMatchCaseInsensitive
member.summary: Search for elements that end with the value, ignoring case. (Available in Mac OS X v10.4 and later.)

member.name: F:Monobjc.AddressBook.ABSearchComparison.kABWithinIntervalAroundToday
member.summary: Search for elements that are within a time interval (in seconds) forward or backward from today. (Available in Mac OS X v10.4 and later.)

member.name: F:Monobjc.AddressBook.ABSearchComparison.kABWithinIntervalAroundTodayYearless
member.summary: Search for elements that are within a time interval (in seconds) forward or backward from this day in any year. (Available in Mac OS X v10.4 and later.)

member.name: F:Monobjc.AddressBook.ABSearchComparison.kABNotWithinIntervalAroundToday
member.summary: Search for elements that are not within a time interval (in seconds) forward or backward from today. (Available in Mac OS X v10.4 and later.)

member.name: F:Monobjc.AddressBook.ABSearchComparison.kABNotWithinIntervalAroundTodayYearless
member.summary: Search for elements that are not within a time interval (in seconds) forward or backward from this day in any year. (Available in Mac OS X v10.4 and later.)

member.name: F:Monobjc.AddressBook.ABSearchComparison.kABWithinIntervalFromToday
member.summary: Search for elements that are within a time interval (in seconds) forward from today. (Available in Mac OS X v10.4 and later.)

member.name: F:Monobjc.AddressBook.ABSearchComparison.kABWithinIntervalFromTodayYearless
member.summary: Search for elements that are within a time interval (in seconds) forward from this day in any year. (Available in Mac OS X v10.4 and later.)

member.name: F:Monobjc.AddressBook.ABSearchComparison.kABNotWithinIntervalFromToday
member.summary: Search for elements that are not within a time interval (in seconds) forward from today. (Available in Mac OS X v10.4 and later.)

member.name: F:Monobjc.AddressBook.ABSearchComparison.kABNotWithinIntervalFromTodayYearless
member.summary: Search for elements that are not within a time interval (in seconds) forward from this day in any year. (Available in Mac OS X v10.4 and later.)

member.name: T:Monobjc.AddressBook.ABSearchConjunction
member.summary: Defines constants used to combine search elements.

member.name: F:Monobjc.AddressBook.ABSearchConjunction.kABSearchAnd
member.summary: Join the search elements together with the AND operand.

member.name: F:Monobjc.AddressBook.ABSearchConjunction.kABSearchOr
member.summary: Join the search elements together with the OR operand.
